testsuite.name: Scenario: User is navigating between questions,

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: User is navigating between questions,

testcase.name: And I am on "Class Homepage" page of "Demonstration Class" class
testcase.classname: Scenario: User is navigating between questions,

testcase.name: And "Student Readiness Test" assignment in "Student Readiness" unit is opened

testcase.name: And the content of "Question 1" with title "Assignment Navigation" is displayed
testcase.classname: Scenario: User is navigating between questions,

testcase.name: When I use "Next" button to navigate to "Question 2"
testcase.classname: Scenario: User is navigating between questions,

testcase.classname: Scenario: User is navigating between questions,

testcase.name: But "Question 2" item in the question menu is disabled
testcase.classname: Scenario: User is navigating between questions,

testcase.name: And "Back" button is enabled
testcase.classname: Scenario: User is navigating between questions,

testcase.name: And "Next" button is enabled
testcase.classname: Scenario: User is navigating between questions,

testcase.name: When I use "Back" button to navigate to "Question 1"
testcase.classname: Scenario: User is navigating between questions,

testcase.name: Then the content of "Question 1" with title "Assignment Navigation" is displayed
testcase.classname: Scenario: User is navigating between questions,

testcase.name: But "Question 1" item in the question menu is disabled
testcase.classname: Scenario: User is navigating between questions,

testcase.name: And "Back" button is disabled
testcase.classname: Scenario: User is navigating between questions,

testcase.name: And "Next" button is enabled
testcase.classname: Scenario: User is navigating between questions,

testcase.name: Then I save and quit assignment to clear assignment state
testcase.classname: Scenario: User is navigating between questions,

testcase.name: And I am on the Class Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: User is navigating between questions,
